name: swarm

effect.x_y: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.x_y: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon is in trouble.
